I guess our definition of "sane" is very similar (although reading various IETF mailing lists one starts to wonder...). The definition of "defaults I want to fit my needs" obviously varies.

How about rephrasing "sane" as "something that will do the least damage in the hands of clueless people randomly playing google-and-paste game on their edge routers" ;)
